Source.Name: jojodiff
Source.Summary: jojodiff is a diff utility for binary files
Source.Description: jdiff is a program that outputs the differences between two (binary) files. jpatch can then be used to reconstruct the second file from the first file.

Package.Name: jojodiff
Package.Summary: jojodiff is a diff utility for binary files
Package.Description: jdiff is a program that outputs the differences between two (binary) files. jpatch can then be used to reconstruct the second file from the first file.
